bibl.title: Bemerkungen zu Papyri XXX. <Korr. Tyche>
bibl.note: 832-837. Bemerkungen zu dokumentarischen Papyri aus dem 6.-7. Jh. II (Lajos Berkes). - 832. P. Lond. III, 1028 (p. 276). - 833. P. Lond. V, 1791. - 834. P. Mich. XV, 748. - 835. S.B. I, 5319 [= P. Berol. Inv. 2716]. - 836. S.B. IV, 7438 [= P. Gen. Inv. 210]. - 837. S.B. V, 7655 [= P. Berol. Inv. 9511]. - 838-843. New Ghostnames from Papyrological Documents (Ana Isabel Blasco Torres). - 838. Ἁρνελτωτης → Ἁρνεκτωτης [P. Tebt. I, 27, col. 2, 27]. - 839. Λαβως → Λαβωις [P.S.I. IV, 371 verso, 23]. - 840. Μαρυθισουχος → Μαρεσισουχος [P. Tebt. I, 42 (= W.Chrest. 328), 2]. - 841. Πετεαρσεπθις → Πετεαρσενθευς [B.G.U. VI, 1491 (= C.Ptol.Sklav. II, 221), 7]. - 842. Πρεκμηχις → Πρεμμηχις [S.B. I, 4364, l. 1 = P. Harvard Univ. Inv. 3172]. - 843. Ταχεκυσις → Ταπεκυσις [P. Erl. 44, col. 3, 27]. - 844-850. (Willy Clarysse). - 844. B.G.U. XVI, 2673. - 845. P. Erl. 90. - 846. P. Köln XII, 476. - 847. P. Tebt. III, 1039. - 848. S.B. XXII, 15600 [= P. Mich. Inv. 4033]. - 849. O. Wilcken II, 1152. - 850. O. Wilcken II, 1221. - 851. P.S.I. XII, 1228 and P. Turner 40 (Susan Fogarty). - 852. Two notarial documents from Hermonthis: from Armant (through Fayum?) to Berlin and Paris [B.G.U. II, 668] (Nikolaos Gonis). - 853. Greek Mummy Labels at the British Museum - A Note [T. Lond. Inv. EA 24487 = Raquel Martín Hernández & Sofía Torallas Tovar, Some Unpublished Greek Mummy Labels at the British Museum, ZPE 198 (2016) pp. 181-182, No. 11] (Csaba A. La'da). - 854. P. Flor. III, 359: qualche considerazione (Federica Micucci).
bibl.seg: 145.4 B.G.U. II, 668; VI, 1491; XVI, 2673 O. Wilcken II, 1152; 1221 P. Berol. Inv. 2716; 9511 P. Erl. 44; 90 P. Flor. III, 359 P. Gen. Inv. 210 P. Harvard Univ. Inv. 3172 P. Köln XII, 476 P. Lond. III, 1028 (p. 276); V, 1791 P. Mich. Inv. 4033 P. Mich. XV, 748 P.S.I. IV, 371; XII, 1228 P. Tebt. I, 27; 42; III, 1039 P. Turner 40 T. Lond. Inv. EA 24487
